params._callers: array of addresses that should be added to known callers

anyCall(address,bytes,address,uint256,ui.details: Only callable by known callers. Fee flags should be set to 2 in most if not all use cases involing this contract.

params._data: calldata with function signature to use
params._fallback: address of the fallback contract to use if the call fails
params._flags: flags for determining on which network should caller pay the fee (0 = desitnation chain, 2 = origin chain)
params._toChainId: chainId to send the call to

anyExecute(bytes).details: Only callable anyCallExecutor, the executor contract of anyCallV6

params.toAndData: abi encoded target address and function calldata to execute

returns._0: boolean indicating success of the call
returns._1: bytes any data returned from the call

constructor.details: Doesn't do anything except to set isInitialized = true via initializer

initialize(address,address).details: This needs to be called on proxies of this contract

params._owner: address that will be the owner of this contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.to: address to send the tokens to
params.token: address of the ERC20 token to rescue. Use zero address for ETH

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: AnyCallTranslator also know as the AnyCallProxy

addKnownCallers(address[]).notice: Adds addresses to known caller array

anyCall(address,bytes,address,uint256,ui.notice: Send a cross chain call via anyCallV6

anyExecute(bytes).notice: Receive a cross chain call via anyCallV6 and execute a call on this network

initialize(address,address).notice: Initialize the AnyCallTranslator contract for proxies

removeKnownCallers(address[]).notice: Removes addresses from known caller array

rescue(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue any ERC20 tokens that are stuck in this contract

withdraw(uint256).notice: withdraw any ETH that was sent to AnyCall contract

userdoc.notice: AnyCallTranslator is responsible for translating messages for AnyCallV6
